title: 820-2915-B not charging
message:
Hi to everyone!

I have here a 820-2915-B board that after connecting to a defective charger (power cord was damaged and shorted) stopped charging battery.
Logic board works perfectly if battery is charged, and i can see green light (no dim, full bright).
I've already changed magsafe connector with no effects.

Where you suggest to start?

thanks!

title: 820-2915-B not charging
message: Check R7005, D7005, R7021/22, R7051/52. If any of them are bad then U7000 will be dead too.

title: 820-2915-B not charging
message: is battery recogniced on OS???? If yes, check R7051-R7052 or resistance between pins 7-18 from U7000, if it is not detected check voltage on pins 4 and 6 from J6950 it should be about 3.4V..... Report values.....

title: 820-2915-B not charging
message:
yes, battery is recognized!
i will check and post everything, meanwhile thanks guys!

title: 820-2915-B not charging
message:
R7051 2.6 ohm
R7052 0.4 ohm
Between pins 7-18 i get 24M

title: 820-2915-B not charging
message:
